Text: CEG DASH Cc Gentlemen Attached for your review is a draft of the CEG DASH David Gorte plans to circulate the final draft of the DASH to Rick Buy Jeff McMahon Ray Bowen Ken Lay Greg Whalley and Mark Frevert on or before Monday morning We plan to have the DASH executed on Monday by all signers Preclosing is scheduled for Monday with funding on Tuesday Please let me know if anyone else should review and or sign the DASH If you have any question or comments please call Have a happy Thanksgiving Regards David David M Koogler Enron Corp Corporate Development Legal Smith Street Houston Texas fax

CEG DASH Final Cc Gentlemen Attached is the final form of CEG DASH along with a copy marked to show the changes made to the v draft previously circulated to you Cullen please print and execute the signature page and send the executed signature page to me Jeff and Jordan I will bring this with me to our meeting for your signatures David Gorte will obtain all other signatures If you have any questions or comments call me or David Gorte Regards David

FW CEG DASH Final Final Cc Attached is the final draft with minor changes made by David Gorte along with a copy marked to show the changes Original Message From Koogler David Sent Monday November PM To Stabler Frank Waddell Rick Haedicke Mark E Mintz Jordan Donahue Jeff Duke Cullen Cc Gorte David Subject CEG DASH Final Gentlemen Attached is the final form of CEG DASH along with a copy marked to show the changes made to the v draft previously circulated to you Cullen please print and execute the signature page and send the executed signature page to me Jeff and Jordan I will bring this with me to our meeting for your signatures David Gorte will obtain all other signatures If you have any questions or comments call me or David Gorte Regards David
